name: Solitairescapes!
description:
Relax and unwind with a game of Solitaire surrounded by stunning views. It’s the classic card game you love, now set in the most beautiful scenes!

We’ve removed all unnecessary features to give you a clean and intuitive experience. It’s no-fuss Solitaire, with a beautiful design that lets you simply play!

SolitaireScapes is the perfect game to help you relax and keep you sharp. It is played in the style of Klondike Solitaire, also known as Patience — the most popular card game in the world! With every new game, you’ll get a new deck of cards and a brand new design: play from the mountains to jungles, from sand-swept deserts to the crystal glaciers.

Try out our daily challenge to collect golden trophies, or play unlimited decks for free! You can choose between winnable decks (guaranteed to be solvable) or try your luck with a totally random game. Feel free to play the game your way, with a 1 card or 3 card draw, and choose between classic or Vegas style scoring.

Featuring:

- Classic Klondike Solitaire gameplay
- Beautiful photo backgrounds
- Fun daily challenges
- Offline play
- Detailed player statistics
- Unlimited free undo
- Unlimited free hints
- Customizable card and table design
- Vegas and Classic Solitaire scoring modes
- Cumulative Vegas scoring
- Random or Winnable solitaire decks
- Left-Handed Mode
- Support for iPad
- Beautiful HD Graphics

Have you never played Solitaire before?

Klondike Solitaire uses a standard 52 card deck of playing cards without jokers. The objective of the game is to expose all cards and move them into the foundation piles. There are 4 foundation piles (one for each suit) that are represented on the screen by an “A” written on it. These piles are built upward in suit from Aces to Kings.

In Solitaire there are 7 tableau columns that are built downward (in decreasing rank from Kings to Aces) in alternating colours (red and black). The aim of the game is to clear all the rows into the suitable foundation piles.

If you enjoy gin rummy, spider solitaire, or other card games, you’ll pick up Klondike solitaire in no time!

Solitaire is a great opportunity to improve your problem-solving skills, relax and have fun! Return to the timeless PC classic as it comes to your phone so that you can play it anytime, anywhere!

Thanks again for playing, and as always If you have any suggestion please let us know at solitaire_support@tripledotstudios.com
